Desc.entry: A social group comprised of qualified nurses, from outside the UK who have joined the NHS Sheffield Teaching Hospitals or North Derbyshire Trusts in 2001. The nurses in the group come from all over the world, with the majority of it's members coming from the Philippines, India or Africa, however they are all linked by their passion and commitment to quality nursing care. The group organises social activities, takes part in conferences and is busy preparing for their 10th anniversay celebration in 2011.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Various venues and times, please contact for details
